In 2015, a rice farmer named Andorra, a former Vietnamese soldier from the Vietnam War, encountered a strange red dog while farming. This creature was SCP-939, though he didn't know it at the time. His son Boa, who loved dogs, ran to pet what he thought was Clifford the red dog, but SCP-939 killed him instantly.
